mapper.insert: insert into xshtest.appcard_external_interface_log ( id, request_url, request_parameter, request_time, response_parameter, response_time, server_ip, create_date, log_type, request_plaintext ) values ( xshtest.APPCARD_EXTERNAL_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{requestUrl}, #{requestStr}, to_date(#{requestTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{responstStr}, sysdate, #{serverIp}, sysdate, #{logType}, #{requestPlaintext} )
